name: TL: Aeon World Map
description:
This is an interactive region reference map for Aeon, the world of Trinity Log. It is a world building hobby project Co-Writen by AealZX and Dragoonwys, you can find the link to the homepage by clicking on the icon below.------------------------------------------------------

Nations:

Aterna: Served under the Goddess of Light, Atara. These lands are known for their holy, and light based races, and also for their dazzling environments.

Resolum: Served under the Defender of Balance, Ellia. These lands are home to neutral based races, and are also full of life in both plants and animals.

Devii Ral: Served under the Dark God, Deval. These lands are known for their dark, and demonic based races, and are mostly covered by ashen clouds from a giant volcano, making the areas fairly dark even in the middle of the day.

Neutral: Areas that serve no god predominantly.

Regions:

At present day, after the War of Echoes ended, the nations and regions were left as they were for now, having world focus more on restoring the broken lands and people.

Major Locations:

Key locations that are specific to the world, mainly consisting of the capital cities of each nation.

Minor Locations:

Key locations that are relevant to characters specifically, and not necessarily important to the world as a whole.

Eclipse Seal:

The areas of land that were sealed in the Sun and Moon Prisons during the Age of Harmony because of Ellia and the eclipse.
